---
title: "met-mod"
---

```{r}


bt_wc_df = read.csv(
  "BTRI_mucin_study_data/Bacteroides_thetaiotaomicron/BT_WC_counts.csv")


bt_mucin_df = read.csv(
  "BTRI_mucin_study_data/Bacteroides_thetaiotaomicron/BT_mucin_counts.csv")


any(is.na(bt_wc_df))
any(is.na(bt_mucin_df))


bt_wc_corr <- cor(t(bt_wc_df[,-1]))
bt_mucin_corr <- cor(t(bt_mucin_df[,-1]))


library(reshape2)

bt_wc_corr_melt = melt(bt_wc_corr)
bt_mucin_corr_melt = melt(bt_mucin_corr)
merged <- merge(bt_wc_corr_melt, bt_mucin_corr_melt, by = c("Var1", "Var2"))

cor(merged$value.x, merged$value.y)



```
